articles.title: Brave annonce de nouvelles fonctionnalités pour accélérer l’adoption des crypto-monnaies
articles.description: La nouvelle version du navigateur Brave  comprendra un nouveau portefeuille Ethereum (ETH) qui intégrera un agrégateur d’exchanges décentralisés (DEX) et d’autres fonctionnalités.

articles.title: Many pieces of the Diem puzzle still missing as launch gets delayed
articles.description: Diem is still awaiting regulatory approval from Swiss authorities but other governments are insisting on stricter regulations for privately-issued stablecoins.

articles.title: First Boulevard raises $5M for its digital bank aimed at Black America
articles.description: The murder of George Floyd last May ignited many things in the United States last year — one of which that was perhaps unexpected: a rise in the number of digital banks targeting the Black community. Some members of the Black community took their belief that …

articles.title: After a Year of Quantum Advances, the Time to Protect Is Now
articles.description: Innovations in quantum computing mean enterprise and manufacturing organizations need to start planning now to defend against new types of cybersecurity threats.

articles.title: How to sell a cat GIF for half a million dollars
articles.description: Non-fungible tokens, or NFTs, allow digital art lovers to buy works like Nyan Cat using crypto currency technology on a blackchain.

articles.title: Le GIF de Nyan Cat a été vendu pour un demi-million de dollars grâce à la blockchain
articles.description:
